definitions.text:
Extreme enmity, or evil dispositions of heart towards another; malice without provocation, or malevolence with baseness of heart; deep rooted spite.
1. Virulence; destructive tendency; the malignity of an ulcer or disease.
2. Extreme evilness of nature; the malignity of fraud.
3. Extreme sinfulness; enormity or heinousness; the malignity of sin.
